events.message: I recently received my order but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the size is completely wrong and I cannot use the product.
The customer's concern has been categorized under Refund due to request for money back related to wrong sizing.
Assigning refund specialist to handle customer's request regarding incorrect size and refund claim.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the size wasn’t right. I’m here to help with your refund request. Could you please confirm your order number?
To process your refund, may I also ask if the product has been opened or used, and if you still have the original packaging?
Thank you for responding. The product is unopened, and I still have all original packaging intact. My order number is 789654123.
We can arrange a prepaid return shipping label for you. Once we receive the item, we will process a full refund within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds perfect. Thank you for making this easy. I will print the label and send the product back right away.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please check your inbox. We look forward to resolving your refund quickly once we receive the item.
Just following up to confirm if you have sent back the product and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent it last week and just received confirmation of the refund. Thanks for your help and quick service.
We’re glad the refund was processed smoothly. Closing this case now, but feel free to reach out anytime for further assistance.
You will receive a brief satisfaction survey shortly. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
